page.title: 06MOTHER'S DAY IN E. KILBRIDE
page.content: MOTHER'S DAY IN EAST KILBRIDE My mum gets up at about 7.50am on a school day.She gets washed,dressed and then goes to the kitchen for breakfast After that she washes the dishes and gets ready to go to work.She teaches near Hamilton at a school for handi- capped children.Work begins at 9.00am and finishes at 3.00pm.My mum is always tired after her day teaching home-economics.Usually she makes a cup of coffee when she gets home,and sits watching the television.It is soon time for her to make the dinner,so I usually help her by peeling potatoes. After dinner my big brothers do the dishes and my parents and I go to the shopping centre.My parents get the food while I buy sweets.When we get in my mum has more coffee and tea,then she watches television till around 11.30pm.
